RAW.SOURCE:
` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Report YGPL_DBA_TABLES_CHECK *---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ygpl_dba_tables_check LINE-SIZE 256.
TABLES: tadir, tdevc. TYPE-POOLS: abap, icon.
SELECT-OPTIONS: s_srcs FOR tadir-srcsystem DEFAULT sy-sysid, s_soft FOR tdevc-dlvunit, s_name FOR tadir-obj_name, s_pack FOR tadir-devclass. PARAMETERS: p_ext TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. SELECT-OPTIONS: s_author FOR tadir-author DEFAULT sy-uname.
PARAMETERS: p_size TYPE ygpl_dba_table_size.
DATA o_obj_size TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_object_size.
INITIALIZATION. PERFORM set_default_object_size IN PROGRAM ygpl_dba_cockpit CHANGING p_size o_obj_size.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA o_list TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_table_list. DATA o_check TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_check_table.
PERFORM create_list IN PROGRAM ygpl_dba_cockpit USING s_srcs[] s_soft[] s_name[] s_pack[] s_author[] p_ext p_size CHANGING o_list.
o_check = ygpl_dba_factories=>create_check_table( ). o_check->set_list( o_list ). o_check->do_check( ).
PERFORM display_result USING o_check.
END-OF-SELECTION. *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form DISPLAY_RESULT *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM display_result USING o_check TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_check_table. DATA no_need_just_for_use_case_link TYPE ygpl_dba_tables_check_result. DATA t_data TYPE ygplidba_check_tables=>tt_tables_check_log. t_data = o_check->check_log. SORT t_data BY namespace appl_component devclass table_name subindex_name index_name. CALL FUNCTION 'REUSE_ALV_GRID_DISPLAY' EXPORTING * I_INTERFACE_CHECK = ' ' * I_BYPASSING_BUFFER = ' ' * I_BUFFER_ACTIVE = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_PROGRAM = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_PF_STATUS_SET = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_USER_COMMAND = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_TOP_OF_PAGE = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_HTML_TOP_OF_PAGE = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_HTML_END_OF_LIST = ' ' i_structure_name = 'YGPL_DBA_TABLES_CHECK_RESULT' * I_BACKGROUND_ID = ' ' * I_GRID_TITLE = * I_GRID_SETTINGS = * IS_LAYOUT = * IT_FIELDCAT = * IT_EXCLUDING = * IT_SPECIAL_GROUPS = * IT_SORT = * IT_FILTER = * IS_SEL_HIDE = * I_DEFAULT = 'X' * I_SAVE = ' ' * IS_VARIANT = * IT_EVENTS = * IT_EVENT_EXIT = * IS_PRINT = * IS_REPREP_ID = * I_SCREEN_START_COLUMN = 0 * I_SCREEN_START_LINE = 0 * I_SCREEN_END_COLUMN = 0 * I_SCREEN_END_LINE = 0 * I_HTML_HEIGHT_TOP = 0 * I_HTML_HEIGHT_END = 0 * IT_ALV_GRAPHICS = * IT_HYPERLINK = * IT_ADD_FIELDCAT = * IT_EXCEPT_QINFO = * IR_SALV_FULLSCREEN_ADAPTER = * IMPORTING * E_EXIT_CAUSED_BY_CALLER = * ES_EXIT_CAUSED_BY_USER = TABLES t_outtab = t_data EXCEPTIONS program_error = 1 OTHERS = 2. IF sy-subrc <> 0. MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno WITH sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4. ENDIF.
ENDFORM. " DISPLAY_RESULT

ITEM.LONG_TXT: U1&PURPOSE& ASCheck the selected tables. This action is exactly the same as the "check button" on table display in transaction SE11. ASOnly messages like "Index &-& completely contains the fields of index <(>&<)>" are returned. U1&INTEGRATION& AS U1&PREREQUISITES& AS U1&FEATURES& AS U2&SELECTION& AS U2&STANDARD_VARIANTS& AS U2&OUTPUT& AS U1&ACTIVITIES& ASYou should adapt or delete the index (the one that completely contains the fields of an other index). B1If this index is a SAP one, please search for notes and/or open an OSS message to get instructions. B1If this index is a customer one, please fix this issue by removing the index. U1&EXAMPLE& ASYou should get this message with index BKPF-BUT on ECC 6.0 or above.
